channel.title: Appreciated Welcome Armae. My personal opinions on you and Mind Warp
channel.description:
Hello Armae.
I'm happy for you to have started development.
Personally I do think Bos/Ellie needs a break. She seems much more prone to mental breaks than usual as of recent. So I think it is absolutely great to have extra help with the game as being a one man dev can be extremely challenging. I'm concerned for ya here Ellie. I'm not disliking you here. Sure I have disagreed with you in the past but I do care for you, like pretty much everyone on these forums
I'm overall fine with the simplification change but it still doesn't really change that Illusionist was already a weak convert.
Now what I suggest is that you put it on the level of Noble by giving their primary ability as well as the frame.
> *Personal change for Mind Warp* > **Warped Link (Night)** - Link target player, framing them as well.
I'm fairly neutral on this train against Mind Warp's change. but I still want Squire but it's not the end of the world to not have Squire ingame.
At least itll give Illusionist more flexibility on claiming Mystic so that's a plus. Also Unseen getting more claims is also nice.
